phrases.text: Có đám (chứ) mây xanh Trên trời (thời) có đám (chứ) mây xanh
phrases.english: have/there is đám [?] particle (emphasis) cloud blue/green on/above sky/heaven time have/there is đám [?] particle (emphasis) cloud blue/green

culturalContext.description: As the opening phrase, this establishes the song's emotional tone and invites audience engagement.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Opening phrases in Vietnamese folk songs often use vocatives (ơi, này) to grab attention before the narrative begins
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions
culturalContext.musicalContext: As the opening phrase, it establishes the tonal center and introduces the melodic motif that will be varied throughout.

phrases.text: Ở giữa (thời) mây trắng (ấy) chung quanh mây bên vàng ư
phrases.english: at/live giữa [?] time cloud white that together/common around cloud side/beside yellow (particle)

culturalContext.description: This narrative phrase contributes to the song's narrative structure and emotional arc, typical of Northern folk traditions.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions
Đàn tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are 20th century innovations - originals were vocal

phrases.text: ư) Ước gì (thời) Anh lấy (chứ) được nàng (thời) anh (này) mua gạch (ấy) Bát Tràng đem về xây ư ư

culturalContext.musicalContext: Question phrases in Vietnamese folk music traditionally end on an unstable pitch (2nd or 5th scale degree) creating anticipation for the answer.

culturalContext.description: As the closing phrase, this provides resolution and often returns to opening themes for circular structure.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions

culturalContext.musicalContext: As the closing phrase, it typically returns to the tonic note and may quote the opening melody for circular structure.
